reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be a great quality thick piece that feels soft and is perfect for chilly days, being warm but not suffocating.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sporty sweater
items.body: This sweater is the perfect weight, fit and style. Its sporty style is fun for a night out, day shopping or work. Extremely comfortable and true to size Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great material
items.body: I’m really happy with this sweater! The material feels soft, warm, and surprisingly lightweight, making it perfect for everyday wear. The fit is true to size and really flattering without being too tight. I’ve already washed it once, and it held up beautifully—no shrinking, pilling, or loose threads. The color is exactly as shown in the photos and looks even better in person. It’s cozy enough for chilly days but still breathable, so I can wear it comfortably indoors. Overall, this sweater exceeded my expectations. Great quality for the price, and I would definitely purchase again in other colors! Read more
items.author: Leidy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs large!
items.body: I really wanted to keep this sweater as it is super soft and seems well-made, but it runs pretty oversized. I am almost 5’5” and I was swimming in my usual size L. The navy color is also so dark it looks almost black. I will give the size M a try and see how that goes? Read more
items.author: Lori B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t find fault with this one!
items.body: Love the feel of this sweater. It is soft and comfy but not too hot. It is made of a soft mid weight yarn and the neckline and collar are just so flattering. I ordered the black and tan color which is so versatile. I wore the sweater with leggings today but it would also look great with jeans or khaki pants. I ordered my normal size small which was a perfect fit so that I can wear it with leggings but it’s not too oversized for jeans. The sleeves are just past my wrists but not too long. I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t say how it will wash but after one wear I can say I did not notice any pilling. This sweater was a nice value for the money since it is so versatile in styling. Read more
items.author: sailfishes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great closet staple for your Fall Wardrobe!
items.body: The colors are exactly what’s shown, it is so soft, this sweater is lightweight but still feels like expensive quality, I have it tucked in but the length is great for anyone who doesn’t like cropped sweaters. Read more
items.author: Trending with Katlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy and looks AMAZING
items.body: Great colors, fits great and looks amazing. Best item I’ve purchased from Amazon Sweater feels great and colors are accurate from the photo Read more
items.author: Antoinette Stair

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Chic: The perfect casual sweater!
items.body: This has quickly become my one of my favorite wardrobe staples. The quality is good it is warm, but not overly heavy. Nice for a chilly day. The fit is just right its relaxed but not overly baggy, giving it a stylish yet laid-back look. It washes well too- no shrinking or fading. Can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: ART27

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like it
items.body: Very cute and soft Read more
items.author: cheyenne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot Armygreen, Armygreen Black, Strip Apricot, Apricot Caramel, Gray Red, Blue Orange, Strip Red Blue, Strip Black Red, B White Burgundy, Pure Black, Pure Apricot, B White Navyblue, Burgundy White, A Apricot Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
